instruction: Explain how to make homemade guacamole.
output:
To make homemade guacamole, start by mashing an avocado with a fork. Then add minced onions, garlic, cilantro, and diced tomatoes. Mix in the juice of half a lime and season it with salt and pepper to taste. For a spicy version, stir in some jalapeño peppers.

Enjoy!
